title: Idris Elba is my best friend in Cyberpunk 2077 Phantom Liberty, and we're gonna save the president
description: We played Cyberpunk 2077's first and only expansion at Summer Game Fest.

title: inXile's next game is a bold gamble that asks what if Bioshock Infinite, but better?
description: Clockwork Revolution certainly has a familiar feeling, but where it goes from there is anyone's guess.

title: Payday 3 looks like it's making the wise decision to not change very much at all
description: We finally got a release date during today's Xbox Games Showcase.

title: Overwatch 2's PvE mode may be dead, but I'll play the hell out of these story missions
description: Jury's still out on the new Flashpoint mode.

title: Cities: Skylines 2 looks amazing
description: The sequel to our favorite city builder is coming in October.

title: Star Wars Outlaws better be good, because it's basically the open world Star Wars game us nerds have all been dreaming about for years
description: Scoundrels, stylish droids, and one last heist—it's what I've always wanted.

title: Monkey Island is coming to Sea of Thieves, and because of that, so am I
description: LucasArts' iconic adventure game will be folded into Rare's pirate sim in a new three-part expansion.

title: Yep, I'm gonna reinstall all 80GB of Microsoft Flight Simulator to fly Dune's ornithopter
description: The iconic Dune 'thopter is coming to Microsoft Flight Simulator the same day as the movie hits theaters.

title: Enter here for a chance to win a one month PC Game Pass membership
description: As seen at the 2023 PC Gaming Show, we've got 10,000 PC Game Pass subs to give away. Enter here!

title: Enter here for a chance to win a Park Beyond Collector's Edition
description: The physical Collector's Edition includes a figurine, art book, soundtrack, poster, and more.

title: I'm not sure what to expect from South of Midnight, but the vibes are impeccable
description: It's a third-person action-adventure, FYI.

title: Richard Ayoade in Fable is inspired casting, and the trailer's tone is perfect too
description: Playground may be cooking something Fable-ous.

title: Exclusive: Obsidian breaks 3-year silence to spill the secrets of Avowed, its next big RPG
description: Obsidian spills the first details on combat, magic, character-building, and how important companions are to the story.

title: Exclusive: Avowed started as Obsidian's Skyrim, but evolved to focus on depth over breadth, 'where Obsidian really shines'
description: "We backed up and said again: What are we good at? What's our lane?"

title: How to watch the Starfield Direct
description: Bethesda is dedicating its 2023 summer showcase to Starfield with a showcase airing right after the Xbox event on Sunday.

title: How to watch the Xbox Games Showcase 2023
description: Microsoft's bringing out its first-party games this Sunday, followed by a deep dive into Starfield.

title: At last, Midnight Suns got a New Game+ update that lets you keep your cards
description: Now you can choose which progress carries over, and which doesn't.

title: You can play a demo of the 'Aussie Fallout' CRPG Broken Roads on Steam
description: Grab your gun and a lump of unidentified meat, it's time for a post-apocalyptic adventure.

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #722: Sunday, June 11
description: A hint to help you out and today's Wordle answer if you need it.

title: The greatest hat in all Diablo has surfaced in Diablo 4
description: Shako's back, baby.
